content: DD 150-U-22 Cordless core drill Cordless diamond coring machine for handheld or rig-based coring from 52-162 mm (2 - 6-3/8) in concrete or up to 252mm (10”) in masonry (Nuron battery) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond coring- - - ### FEATURES:Features E-gears for higher performance – electronic gears set RPM/torque combinations for optimized drilling speeds at every diameter Safer handheld coring – Active Torque Control (ATC) helps protect you from uncontrolled spinning if the core bit jams More coring per charge – pair with new cordless optimized core bits for up to 30% more battery reach Easier core removal – oscillating function helps shake loose stuck cores to save downtime Less multi-tasking – Bluetooth® connects information from your water management system and vacuum all in one real-time display Applications Rig-based wet drilling in concrete for pipe penetrations, cable trays and ducts and for the installation of railings and barriers Handheld wet drilling for small pipe penetrations in plumbing applications Handheld dry drilling in masonry for pipe penetrations in plumbing, heating and air conditioning installations Handheld coring for large diameter sewage pipes, chimneys, and stove installations ### TECHNICAL DATA: Diameter range: 2-1/16 - 6-3/8 in Base material: Masonry, Asphalt, Concrete, Reinforced concrete, Wood Operation mode: Hand-held and rig-mounted drilling system Technical Data | Diameter range | 2-1/16 - 6-3/8 in | Base material | Masonry, Asphalt, Concrete, Reinforced concrete, Wood | Operation mode | Hand-held or rig-mounted drilling system | Rated input power | 1650 W | Number of gears | 20 | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 16.3 lb | Weight of complete system | 42 lb | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 92 dB (A) | 1 | Corner accessibility | 6.5 in | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3955453 - DD 150-U-22 + 2 1/2,3 1/2,4 1/2 BITS - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 150-U-22 Cordl. diam. coring tool - 1x BI+ (M27x1.5) Chuck - 1x DD 110/150/160 Tool case assy - 1x B 2 1/2/14 SPX-A speed Core bit - 1x B 3 1/2/14 SPX-A speed Core bit - 1x B 4 1/2/14 SPX-A speed Core bit - 3x Connection end BI - 3956152 - DD 150-U-22 BI + 4 SPX-A BIT - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 150-U-22 Cordl. diam. coring tool - 1x BI+ (M27x1.5) Chuck - 1x DD 110/150/160 Tool case assy - 1x B 4/14 SPX-A speed Core bit - 1x Connection end BI - 3954512 - DD 150-U-22 + 3 SPX-A BIT - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 150-U-22 Cordl. diam. coring tool - 1x BI+ (M27x1.5) Chuck - 1x DD 110/150/160 Tool case assy - 1x B 3/14 SPX-A speed Core bit - 1x Connection end BI - 3956183 - DD 150-U-22 BS + 3 SPX-A BIT - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 150-U-22 Cordl. diam. coring tool - 1x BS/BR (M27x1.5) Chuck - 1x DD 110/150/160 Tool case assy - 1x B 3/14 SPX-A speed Core bit - 1x Connection end BS - 3956151 - DD 150-U-22 BI + 2 SPX-A BIT - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 150-U-22 Cordl. diam. coring tool - 1x BI+ (M27x1.5) Chuck - 1x DD 110/150/160 Tool case assy - 1x B 2/14 SPX-A speed Core bit - 1x Connection end BI
